ofcourse u can add sounds to every server base, u have to code it urself…

  2. and then the client plays it.

item.title: How to add sound to rsps [delta]
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:4, topic:405457”][quote author=illslayu link=topic=502443.msg3675888#msg3675888 date=1311245259]
You don’t add sound to delta.
The only sound you need in delta is the voice in your head that tells you exatly why delta is shit.
[/quote]
but the thing is u can add sound to delta -.-[/quote]

Right
